app_name: Story Publisher Advantage (SPadv) o Masin blg Tanim na Kamapim Stori
registration_translator_header: TokSave blg Husat i Tanim Tok
orthography_hint: Tokples alfabet i stap olsem wanem?
spoken_language_hint: Ol tok yu save long en
location_type_hint: Saveman blg sekim ol stori i stap we:
camera_revert_title: Go bek long namba wan poto?
camera_revert_message: Yu laik putim bek poto i stap pastaim?
welcome_to_story_producer: Welkam long Story Publisher Adv (SPadv) o Masin blg Tanim n Tilim Stori
please_create_and_then_select_folder: Pastaim, kamapim nupela folder long Files na makim dispela folda long holim eksampel stori
registration_exit_message: Yu laik lusim dispela ples TokSave o nogat? (Sapos yu lusim, ol tok save yu bin raitim bai i stap.)
registration_submit: Salim ol TokSave i go long...
registration_skip_message: Tru tru yu laik abrusim TokSave? (Noken wari, wanem ol tok save yu raitim pinis bai i stap.)
registration_submit_complete_message: Yu redi long salim ol tok save i go?
registration_submit_incomplete_message: Maski yu abrusim sampela tok save -- salim i go ol tok save yu raitim pinis?
registration_error_title: Sori! Samting i paul. Samting yu bin trai long salim, i no bin go.
registration_error_message: Plis, raitim emel blg yu long hia.
registration_saved_successfully: Ol Tok save yu raitim pinis bai i stap sef!
template_space_title: Tok lukaut long spes i stap long pon
template_space_message:
Sapos yu laik tanim planti ol stori na kamapim vidio, yu mas i gat planti spes long pon bilong yu.  1pela GB spes mas i stap long tanim wanwan stori.  Ating yu nogat planti spes long pon ya. Rausim sampela ol poto na vidio long kamapim spes o putim gutpela SD kat.

   Available space:
space_less_than_one_meg: Sori, spes i pinis long pon bilong yu. Nogat 1pela MB i stap.
rename_title_wordlinks: Tainim bek mining blg tok o raitim nem long tokples.
consultant_password_message: Raitim hia tok hait long tok yesa stori i orait:
consultant_incorrect_password_message: Sori! Tok hait i paul. Traim gen.
stories_not_found_title: Sori! Ol stori blg tanim i no stap.
stories_not_found_body: Sori! Ol stori blg tanim i no stap! Ating folda yu bin makim i no holim stori blg tanim. Makim gen raitpela SP Templates folda we ol stori blg tanim i stap - ating dispela folda i stap long SD card.
stories_not_found_in_progress: Ating nogat sampela ol stori i gohet.
stories_not_found_completed: Ating nogat sampela ol stori i pinis.
welcome_screen_select_template_folder_ne: Story Publisher o dispela Masin blg Tanim ol Stori i narakain liklik.  Pastaim yu mas redim ol liklik samting na bihain yu ken lukim na yusim tul ya.  Pastaim yu mas kamapim nupela folda long SD kad (o long ples we i gat planti spes long pon) na yu mas kisim (daunlodim) ol stori sel blg tanim na putim ol stori sel long dispela folda.
workspace_selection_help:
Tell the Story Producer app where to find story templates.

The next screen will be a 'folder picker'.
Navigate to the SP Templates folder (on the SD Card), then tap SELECT at the bottom.
only_demo_present: Sapos yu laik kisim moa stori sel, o mekim narakainkain wok, opim 3-pela lain dua (paitim 3-pela lain i stap antap han kais). Bipo yu kisim moa stori sel, plis raitim na salim Tok Save Nem (na bihain Ples Tok Save Nem bai i stap hait).

audio_Send_Failed: Error occurred, please try sending the audio file again

queue_status_message_get: No Connection: Cannot Retrieve New Messages

learn_phase_practice: Autim gen stori stat i go inap long pinis long tokples blg yu!
learn_phase_overwrite: Tru tru yu laik rausim narapela stori yu bin autim?
wordlink_other_langauge_examples: OLSEM WANEM OL NARAPELA I TANIM:
wordlink_backtranslation: Tanim bek long Tok Inglis o Tok Pisin
wordlinks_csv_read_error: Tul i no inap luksave long wordlinks csv fail

local_credits_unchanged: Ol TokSave long husat i wokim samting long ples i no bin senis!
LS_prompt: Kamapim nupela song long poromanim stori!  Bihain, taim yu pinisim wok na kamapim vidio, yu ken skruim singsing long stori vidio o yu ken larim song i stap nating.

license_body:
The Story Publisher Adv (SPadv) software is jointly copyrighted © 2022, Tyndale Bible Translators and Robin Rempel. Adapted from and built upon original, Story Producer (version 3.0.6) jointly copyrighted © 2020, SIL International and Cedarville University. 

 It is released under the following license: Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person lawfully obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to use and redistribute the software, to build and distribute videos from text and audio-visual data, provided that they are the owner of the data or have permission to distribute it. 

 The Software is protected by international copyright treaty provisions. No person may remove any copyright or other proprietary notice from the software nor reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the software. 

 The software is provided "as is", without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and noninfringement. In no event shall the authors or copyright holders be liable for any claim, damages or other liability, whether in an action or contract, tort or otherwise, arising from, out of or in connection with the software or the use or other dealings in the software. 

 Data is collected whenever the user submits registration info. All the information that the user types into the registration fields, plus phone type, is collected and used by the remote consultant in assisting and communicating with the user.
